publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3032.1 Michael Russell: Scotland and Europe Day-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3032) in the name of Irene Oldfather, leave out from "encourages" to end and insert "looks forward to this relevance being enhanced when Scotland participates enthusiastically in the EU on the basis of equality as a member state, with its own direct representation on the Council of Ministers and European Commission."

S1M-3032.1 Michael Russell: Scotland and Europe Day-As an amendment to motion (S1M-3032) in the name of Irene Oldfather, leave out from "encourages" to end and insert "looks forward to this relevance being enhanced when Scotland participates enthusiastically in the EU on the basis of equality as a member state, with its own direct representation on the Council of Ministers and European Commission."

S1M-3032.1 Michael Russell: Scotland and Europe Day—As an amendment to motion (S1M-3032) in the name of Irene Oldfather, *insert after "Scots"* "looks forward to this relevance being enhanced when Scotland participates enthusiastically in the EU on the basis of equality as a member state, with its own direct representation on the Council of Ministers and European Commission," Supported by: Andrew Wilson*
S1M-3032.1 Scotland and Europe Day (lodged on 29 April 2002) Alex Neil*
